description:
Guy #1

22-year-old married guy with beautiful, round pecs.

Fresh out of the Navy, he showed up with his wife. Unfortunately, she was like a really bad stage mother and wanted to run the whole show. We had to make her wait out in the car while her husband dumped his load.

She was not happy.

Guy #2

24-year-old straight guy, also fresh out of the Navy.

Hot body and really, really nice guy.

Guy #3

27-year-old with unknown sexual orientation. Muscular with bubble butt.

Dances (read: strips) at a club in the south somewhere. Very outgoing, but getting him to lay off the stripper moves was a little difficult.
title: Auditions 18
